name: Paragon MCP
description:
MCP server for Paragon's ActionKit. Provide your agent with hundreds of integration
	tools for providers like Slack, HubSpot, and Notion. Self-hosted and multi-tenant

PROJECT_ID.description: Your Paragon Project ID. Refer to the Paragon docs for instructions on how to retrieve your Project ID and Signing Key

SIGNING_KEY.description: Your Paragon Signing Key. Refer to the Paragon docs for instructions on how to retrieve your Project ID and Signing Key

MCP_SERVER_URL.description: URL of where your server is hosted. Used to send magic links to authenticate integrations.
